alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 7:17PM EDT until August 04 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Orange and Osceola. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bay Lake, Celebration, Intercession City, Champions Gate, Lake Buena Vista, Hollywood Studios, Animal Kingdom and Epcot. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
